column4: Can anyone tell me where my home made Emblems are stored in Ubuntu 7.10?
since you asked so many times now i'm curious... what are Emblems?
ooo... i'm on kde, that's why i didn't know, thx
I use them as tags for my school work
ok... i'm willing to risk they are in a hidden folder in ~
One with "Math" and one with "Danish" etc.
I know, something like that. I have tried to search, but there is many folders with default Emblems
well, i really can't help you there, i never used gnome
See this. The Emblem function is really smart :) http://ubuntuforums.org/attachment.php?attachmentid=49042&d=1194168920
i wonder if there's anything like that in kde... those might prove useful. can you organize by emblem through nautilus?
Yep. I am almost sure it is only a GNOME function - maybe there is a port or something for KDE?
like a plugin for konqueror or smth
I dunno anything about KDE, so can't help with that :)
i shall ask my friend google about it, haha
